recipe_name: Seared scallops with nectarine and chilli
author: James Tanner
method: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan.  Add the nectarine and chilli and fry together for 2-3 minutes. Add the scallops to the frying pan and fry for one minute on each side. To serve, arrange on the centre of a plate and garnish with parsley.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  Â½ a nectarine, stone removed, flesh chopped,  1 chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped,  2 scallops, cleaned,  1 sprig parsley, to garnish
